name: Cosmic Lemonade
instructions: Mix lemon juice and sugar until sugar dissolves
Add cold water and stir well
Add blue food coloring drop by drop until desired color
Add a pinch of edible glitter for cosmic effect
Serve over ice with lemon slice garnish
Watch it sparkle like the universe!

name: Unicorn Smoothie
instructions: Blend banana, mango, coconut milk, honey, and vanilla
Add pink food coloring for magical color
Blend until smooth and creamy
Pour into glass
Top with whipped cream
Sprinkle with rainbow sprinkles
Believe in magic while drinking!

name: Wizard's Brew Hot Chocolate
instructions: Heat milk in a saucepan over medium heat
Whisk in chocolate chips until melted
Add cocoa powder, sugar, and cinnamon
Add a tiny pinch of cayenne for magic
Whisk until frothy and smooth
Pour into mug
Top with marshmallows and chocolate shavings
Cast a warming spell while sipping!

name: Mermaid Water
instructions: Mix coconut water, pineapple juice, and lime juice
Stir in honey until dissolved
Add blue spirulina powder for ocean color
Stir until well combined
Serve over ice
Garnish with coconut flakes and pineapple
Swim with the mermaids (metaphorically)!

name: Dragon's Breath Ginger Ale
instructions: Simmer ginger, sugar, and water for 10 minutes
Strain the ginger syrup and let cool
Mix syrup with sparkling water and lime juice
Add red food coloring for fiery effect
Serve over ice
Garnish with lime wedges and mint
Breathe fire responsibly!
